info.name: Facebook  w/ Custom Background v2.0
info.description:
I wanted Facebook to be fun to look at. I hope you like it.

To change the background, change the url in line 8.
info.additionalInfo:
v2.0
- Complete re-haul of code to correct for changes FB has made
- new background image
- extended popup chat for easier reading
- color tweaks

v1.1
- fixed font color in left comment
- fixed color for navbar

v1.0
- released
